Package aor.spells

Class Summary
Scheduler This class controls all scheduling for Spells.
Spell This is the class that all spells must extend.
Spells The main plugin class! Spells really shouldn't do anything with this, except perhaps using the Logger (log)
SpellSet This class should be extended to allow multiple spells to be put in one jar file, with the class extending spellset not being in a package and having the same name as the jar.
SpellUtils This class contains a bunch of useful helper methods that make spell creation easier
